author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...JERRY'S TRAILING BANDS CONTINUE TO PRODUCE HEAVY RAINS OVER THE LEEWARD ISLANDS...
summary: ...JERRY'S TRAILING BANDS CONTINUE TO PRODUCE HEAVY RAINS OVER THE LEEWARD ISLANDS... As of 5:00 PM AST Fri Oct 10 the center of Jerry was located near 21.5, -63.6 with movement NNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...JERRY'S TRAILING BANDS CONTINUE TO PRODUCE HEAVY RAINS OVER THE LEEWARD ISLANDS... As of 5:00 PM AST Fri Oct 10 the center of Jerry was located near 21.5, -63.6 with movement NNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Jerry (AT5/AL102025)
